about_the_game:
This is a multiplayer fun and casual third person versus game. You can not only destroy your opponents with the weapons in your hands, but you can also modify the properties of almost all objects in the scene to improve your chances of winning. This game offers a variety of maps, gameplay, and props. It also has a currency system for you to upgrade.

In the game you can:

  • Defeat your opponents using different weapons.
  • Modify the size, quality, voltage and other parameters of the items in the map to gain an edge
  • Get coins to upgrade your weapons and characters.
  • Use various skills such as moving items and creating items to make your own fortress.
  • Assisted aiming gives everyone an equal start
  • Split up your team to achieve maximum advantage

    On the game modes you can:

  • Customise game modes
  • Create your own maps.

name: Attribute2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6350 , Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 2GB , NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 , Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 , Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
